name: AirzoneCloud
0:

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Airzone system using your voice with the new Airzone Cloud Skill.
Control the on / off, temperature and operation modes of your installation with your voice.

The Airzone System enables the control of all kinds of duct units, as well as splits and heating units from all manufacturers; for further information, please visit http://www.airzone.es/en/what-is-airzone/

Skill only compatible with 2016 range webservers (AZX6/AZCE6/AZDI6/AZRA6/VAF/ZBS).

Link your Airzone Cloud account and detect your device to start using the Skill in the Alexa app, don’t forget to name the device to control it.

Control the on / off of the zone by asking Alexa to turn on or off the <name of the zone>:
- Alexa, turn on the kitchen.
- Alexa, turn off the kitchen.

Change the operation mode by asking Alexa to set the <name of the zone> to <operation mode>:
- Alexa, set the living room to cool.
- Alexa, set the living room heat.
- Alexa, set the living room to auto (only for compatible systems).

Increase or decrease the temperature of your zone by asking Alexa to increase or decrease the <name of the zone> by <number degrees; or to set the <name of the zone> to <number> degrees:
- Alexa, increase the bedroom by 2 degrees.
- Alexa, decrease the bedroom by 2 degrees.
- Alexa, set the bedroom to 72 degrees.
